Articles.Content:
Quick note: seach wont work on my phone, if this has been done before, tell me and i will delete it.

CONCEPT: a forum Co-op ship build. We start with a single part, and everyone adds one part. After a certain amount of posts, ill build and fly it! After that, we restart and build a new rocket or spaceplane.

RULES:

-Only pick stock parts, or parts from these mods:

*B9

*Firespitter

*Skillful

*Infernal Robotics

*LAZOR

*Kethane

*Extraplanetary Launchpads

*Procedural faringsÃ‚Â²

-You can add only one part per post. Symmetry is allowed

-Clearly state where you place the part

-No removing or replacing

-No sidetracking

Failing to follow these rules will result in me ignoring your input

Ill start by taking a Mk 1 lander can.

Note: building is done in the VAB.

Ã‚Â² if you want to place farings, say the type of faring. The ship as it is right now will be encapsulated.

Edited June 19, 2014 by Anister
Layout 'n stuff
Attaching 4 symmetrical LT-1 landing struts to it. I assumed it was the Mk1 lander can.

Adding a FL-T100 fuel tank on the bottom..

And yes, the first part was a Mk 1
I really think the replace option should only be allowed for the OP. Becuase what i am going to do now is to replace the RTG's back to the LT-1 landing struts.

I really think the replace option should only be allowed for the OP. Becuase what i am going to do now is to replace the RTG's back to the LT-1 landing struts.

Agreed, rules updated. The RTG's are kept as they are.

Also, added a Skillful Anti Air Turret on top of the lander can.

Edited June 19, 2014 by Anister
Place a pair of docking ports between the can and the AA turret.

Place a pair of docking ports between the can and the AA turret.

I don't think you can do that. You would have to remove the turret in order to place the docking ports in between.

Adding a Rockomax 48-7S under that FL-T100 fuel tank.
Adding a jumbo right under the 48-7S, no decoupler.
adding a small kethane scanner on the side of the FL-T100, no symmetry
I'll add an ant engine (LV-1, was it?) under the Jumbo.

Well if it's already going in this direction then another jumbo under that ant engine.

Ohhh boy, that's gonna be a really strange rocket.

Add 10000 jumbo fuel tanx.

remove all ant engines and replace em with an ion engine.

Edited June 18, 2014 by Guest

Add 10000 jumbo fuel tanx.

remove all ant engines and replace em with an ion engine.

You can only add one part at a time. No removing or replacing.
I'm going to add six of the Firespitter airboat fans (with symmetry), placed on the side of the upper jumbo near the top, thrusting down.

Adding a radial chute opposite of the kethane scanner, again no symmetry.

Add 10000 jumbo fuel tanx.

remove all ant engines and replace em with an ion engine.

ignored, please read the rules:

-Ony one part at a time (symmerty allowed)

-No removing

-Clearly state where you put it
Adding the Water Launch System gizmo from Firespitter, and configuring it properly to drop our rocket in the ocean on launch. It can go on the lander can, sideways just above the window.
